DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate feasibility recruit woman different socioeconomic status minority group determine whether woman could achieve maintain modified fat-eating pattern . The full-scale trial seek determine whether low-fat diet could decrease incidence cancer coronary heart disease postmenopausal woman . The National Heart , Lung , Blood Institute contribute fund three-year period measure lipid , lipoprotein , cardiovascular disease risk factor .
DOC.brief_title: Women 's Health Trial : Feasibility Study Minority Populations
DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : The Request Proposal Women 's Health Trial : Feasibility Study Minority Populations develop release National Cancer Institute assistance National Heart , Lung , Blood Institute . DESIGN NARRATIVE : Randomized . Recruitment begin August 1992 end February 1994 . Forty percent subject randomize control group 60 percent dietary intervention group . Dietary counseling aim reduce total fat 20 percent calorie , reduce saturate fat dietary cholesterol intake , increase intake fruit , vegetable , grain product . Recruitment randomization conduct 18-month period three clinical center . Other objective trial include : development evaluation strategy recruit retain woman different racial SES group dietary intervention study ; identification factor affect compliance ; assessment effect modify fat eat pattern cardiovascular disease risk factor , include fast blood lipid lipoprotein , glucose insulin , body weight blood pressure ; identification assessment potential biochemical and/or biological marker dietary adherence . Close-out visit begin May 1994 end September 1994 . These visit include six , twelve , eighteen-month follow-up . NCI extend coordinate center contract January 1996 support data analysis publication research result .
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal woman , age 50 69 year , consume 38 percent total calorie fat baseline .
